comments.creator: fbraun@mozilla.com
comments.author: fbraun@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Oddly, bug 1611238 said it would enforce the restriction, but instead it made IsEvalAllowed return false. Oops?

Patch coming to enable on EARLY_BETA_OR_EARLIER.
comments.text:
Oddly, bug 1611238 said it would enforce the restriction, but instead it made IsEvalAllowed return false. Oops?

Patch coming to enable on EARLY_BETA_OR_EARLIER.

comments.creator: fbraun@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9143618
Bug 1633374 - disallow eval in parent process r=ckerschb,tjr


Changing isEvalAllowed to default to false in EARLY_BETA_OR_EARLIER
As a ride-aling, we check against the allowlist using StringBeginsWith
instead of Equals, to cover telemetry-reported content after filenames
